document_data.mainbody:
he spellseeking worm was a spell used against Tsjancy Yildree during his time as the Magister.The spell is not confirmed to be divination, but by function, it is assumed to be one.
The spell performed or enabled some form of tracking which bypassed many ways of hiding.
The spell was used by Urboltar Highymhelver to track Tsjancy Yildree, the Magister, whom he later slew in . The spell was successful, in spite of Tsjancys grasp of magic being excellent and his powers being boosted by the office of the Magister.
